text: István Szívós Jr. (24 April 1948 – 10 November 2019) was a Hungarian water polo player. He competed in four consecutive Olympics in 1968–1980 and won a medal in each of them. He also won six gold or silver medals at world and European championships and nine national titles. He died 10 November 2019 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Hungarian water polo players Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: István Szívós
